steps: step 3: Click on link PhoneCategory -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 4: Click on link productDetails (iPhone15) -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
step 8: Click on link PlaceOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
step 10: Complete shipping address form and proceed to payment
step 11: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 12: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
